data.what_is:
One phenomenal email marketing platform. Let Swift Digital guide you through your email marketing requirements. (Newsletters, email marketing, surveys, landing pages and SMS)
An Australian success story launched 20 years ago, Swift Digital delivers world-class marketing automation, event management and email marketing platforms to enterprises, federal, state and local government agencies. The company is focused on the needs of Australian marketing and communications professionals who demand: world-class features combined with Australian data security and sovereignty, outstanding local support and ease of use.
data.product_description: Swift Digital is one of Australia's leading marketing automation platforms. Originally developed in 2000 as an email marketing solution, our platform today comprises a seamlessly integrated suite of automation tools, enabling marketers to effectively identify and nurture leads, create personalised content across multiple channels, manage events, and streamline repetitive tasks.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. 12 reviewers of Swift Digital Suite have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords. 12 reviewers of Swift Digital Suite have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. This feature was mentioned in 11 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. 11 reviewers of Swift Digital Suite have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: As reported in 11 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization. This feature was mentioned in 11 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 11 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device. 12 reviewers of Swift Digital Suite have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. 12 reviewers of Swift Digital Suite have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Based on 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. 12 reviewers of Swift Digital Suite have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: As reported in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors. This feature was mentioned in 12 Swift Digital Suite reviews.

features.name: Survey Builder
features.content: Enables users to create surveys through a simple drag-and-drop or WYSIWYG editor

features.name: Question Types
features.content: Allows the use of various question types such as open-ended, closed-ended, multiple choice, and ratings

features.name: Templates
features.content: Offers pre-built templates for creating surveys with different audiences or use cases

features.name: Survey Distribution
features.content: Provides tools for distributing surveys through email, SMS, social media, etc.

features.name: Branching/Skip Logic
features.content: Helps create more intelligent surveys based on respondent's actions and answers

features.name: Branding
features.content: Allows users to customize survey colors, logos, and URLs to match company branding

features.name: Multimedia Support
features.content: Ability to embed videos, photos, or other rich media

features.name: Multilingual Surveys
features.content: Allows for creation of surveys in different languages and advanced survey translation

features.name: Reporting & Analytics
features.content: Provides tools to visualize and analyze data

features.name: BI Tools Integration
features.content: Allows integration with third -party reporting and business intelligence applications

features.name: Data Exporting
features.content: Allows users to export reports from the product into an .xsl, .csv, or .pdf file

features.name: Permissions
features.content: Allows administrators to set permissions on viewing, filtering, or sharing survey results

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Swift Digital Suite?
I have been using this tool for quite some time. I must say it is truly impressive. The tool offers a user interface making various features easily accessible, with a few clicks.

What do you dislike about Swift Digital Suite?
The software sometimes encounters delays. It does come with a slightly higher price tag.. Apart, from these drawbacks the tool is absolutely amazing and incredibly easy to use.

What problems is Swift Digital Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
I utilize it to examine and streamline my organizations footprint.

initial_reviews.review_title: A complete digital suite to market and manage the services and products.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Swift Digital Suite?
We can market our services easily by online service through this marketing software. It is perfect to store, share and manage sales and marketing contacts online, it is also world best marketing manager tool. This software has the great ability to make the surveys and  manages the services efficiently with in a second. It has this tremendous ability to manage our marketing needs and services. We can easily automate our email campaigns, schedules and can also easily access the surveys within this tool. Thus, we can keep intact all of our marketing tactics and all our mail schedules with an incredible reliability.

What do you dislike about Swift Digital Suite?
Although it has been a remarkable addition to our marketing set of tools but sometimes handling the complex surveys and marketing procedures with online service gets difficult and intense as it's not being designed to handle massive set of services. We also often faces the problem in collecting the invoices and expenses of the sales pipeline. So that's why handling the survey procedures and reporting is also a big hurdle especially for new users. Moreover, some difficulties is also faced when we schedule our survey campaign by using the automated services.

What problems is Swift Digital Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
This software is not only great for marketing the products services online but it is also well organized and high maintenance tool for the unlimited sales products throughout the world. Now, we can create our surveys and marketing automation with the help of templates easily without any kind of interruptions because it provide the best options to quickly start the automated marketing. It's kind of intuitive software which is well growing marketing software because of its great surveys and marketing manageable options.

initial_reviews.review_title: A considerate tool with efficient features enhancing the overall performance of professional users.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Swift Digital Suite?
This software has enabled us to reach out to our clients and customers in the most professional way. We have achieved a certain high productivity value in engaging our customers towards our services. We can easily perform email marketing with efficient analytics and reporting systems. We can also gather user insights with custom made surveys which allow us to be more interactive and fully professionally engaged with our user market. We can also easily view all the analytics or can even customize the tool according to our requirements.

What do you dislike about Swift Digital Suite?
We are most generally disappointed with the updates which are somehow at the point of being extincted. There aren't any new additions to the tool since the time of its release despite the fact of being this tool one of the most expensive in the market. We also have to perform most of the functions manually and things aren't done in a manual way. So there's lot of manual work to implement.  The software deployment in an organization is also a challenge in its own self consuming most of the time and requires high expertise.

What problems is Swift Digital Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have overall improved our marketing criteria by maintaining this tool on top of the list. We mainly performs email marketing with this tool and surveys are also performed from time to time. It enables the users to expand their services to a considerable large scale due to its high functionality and efficient performance. It offers very user-friendly and responsive customer support and lots  of features for high standard professionals.

We can also gather user insights with custom made surveys which allow us to be more interactive and fully professionally engaged with our user market. We can also easily view all the analytics or can even customize the tool according to our requirements.

We can  rely on this tool for most of our user-based data collection and feed backs. It allows us to stay in contact with all of our professional circle including the clients and the customers. We mostly rely on this tool for large organizational based surveys and ability to perform email marketing as well.
It is quite easy to customize and far more reliable to use and implement within our ongoing projects and activities. We can easily manage events, emails and surveys. The continuous updates improves this tool day by day.

There are more competitive tool in the market which are offering more versatile features so this software has to make some major changes in their user-interface and functionalities to attract major portion of professionals.

Swift Digital brought automation and consistency to our event management experience; ensuring we could deliver a secure and sophisticatedly customer experience that was backed by world-class local customer support.

all_reviews.review_title: A complete digital suite to market and manage the services and products.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Swift Digital Suite?
We can market our services easily by online service through this marketing software. It is perfect to store, share and manage sales and marketing contacts online, it is also world best marketing manager tool. This software has the great ability to make the surveys and  manages the services efficiently with in a second. It has this tremendous ability to manage our marketing needs and services. We can easily automate our email campaigns, schedules and can also easily access the surveys within this tool. Thus, we can keep intact all of our marketing tactics and all our mail schedules with an incredible reliability.

What do you dislike about Swift Digital Suite?
Although it has been a remarkable addition to our marketing set of tools but sometimes handling the complex surveys and marketing procedures with online service gets difficult and intense as it's not being designed to handle massive set of services. We also often faces the problem in collecting the invoices and expenses of the sales pipeline. So that's why handling the survey procedures and reporting is also a big hurdle especially for new users. Moreover, some difficulties is also faced when we schedule our survey campaign by using the automated services.

What problems is Swift Digital Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
This software is not only great for marketing the products services online but it is also well organized and high maintenance tool for the unlimited sales products throughout the world. Now, we can create our surveys and marketing automation with the help of templates easily without any kind of interruptions because it provide the best options to quickly start the automated marketing. It's kind of intuitive software which is well growing marketing software because of its great surveys and marketing manageable options.

Easy to use platform to create and manage Events, send regular e-mail communications to different groups across our membership base, and also run surveys to get member feedback on the value of our activities. The learning video tools are instructive and easy to apply, and the timely and attentive online support given when we have a question has been invaluable. Its like having an extra set of hands in the office.

What problems is Swift Digital Suite solving and how is that benefiting you?
Swift helped us make our event system more sophisticated by introducing consistent templates, gorgeous banners and modern emails. It secured our event system by guaranteeing the local storage of information, within a secured environment.
